body.name: hiccapop UberBoost Inflatable Booster Car Seat | Blow up Narrow Backless Booster Car Seat for Travel | Portable Booster Seat for Toddlers, Kids, Child | Pink/Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 22 hrs 23 mins
features: PORTABLE AND PACKABLE | Car seats no longer have to be heavy, bulky and impractical. The hiccapop UberBoost portable car seat inflates with only a few breaths (takes less than 20 seconds), and installs easily and quickly. Deflates and rolls up tightly in its own travel bag for compact fit in suitcases, carry-ons, large purse or backpack.

CERTIFIED SAFE FOR YOUR MOST PRECIOUS CARGO | Your child deserves a comfortable and safe car seat for those quick journeys in rental cars, taxis, Uber rides, on school trips or in car pools. Meets or exceeds all federal standards for car seat safety (FMVSS213 Federal Motor Safety Standard for USA).

STURDY, STABLE, SECURE | Non-skid base is designed to sit firm and steady on leather, vinyl or cloth seats. Provides soothing stability while riding and limits movement in case of an accident. Gentle on your upholstery.

PRACTICAL DIMENSIONS | Narrow yet roomy design allows you to fit 3 UberBoost inflatable car seats across the back seat of smaller vehicles, or fit 1 in between 2 traditional car seats. Perfectly accommodates large families, car poolers and busy soccer moms!

SECURITY AND COMFORT | Buoyant and extra comfy for small bottoms. (Your little one will love the ultra cushiony design!) Positioning clips ensure that child’s belt fits properly and comfortably across the lap rather than dangerously digging into the stomach, preventing internal damage in the event of an accident.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Finally, a safe, comfortable and packable alternative to the heavy, bulky booster car seats of old. hiccapop’s inflatable UberBoost car seat inflates in seconds and is a must-have for modern families on the go. Certified safe for your most precious cargo and quality-built to be used daily with the added convenience of being able to fold away into backpacks for after school ride shares, play dates and more! Rigid, double-thick vinyl, steel belt loops, and no-skid silicon beads keep passengers ages 4-11 stable and secure – even for bumpier rides. And, its contoured design combined with air-cushion comfort help create a super-cushy ride you can’t get with hard plastic seats. Safety, comfort, convenience and each seat is backed by hiccapop for life.

Leak-proof valve allows inflating/deflating in seconds – so easy, even a child can do it! No-skid silicone bottom is gentle on upholstery and keeps seat firmly in place on leather, vinyl and cloth. Includes metal belt loop which works with all 3-point seat belt harnesses standard in all vehicles. Our cover is made of durable fabric with a heavy-duty zipper so it can be removed and machine washed.

Narrow, yet roomy – a great space saver for small cars or when you need it to fit between two other car seats. Puncture-resistant double-thick vinyl engineered to hold weights ranging from 40 to 110 lbs. Air-cushion comfort and an ergonomic contoured design provides a softer ride for little bottoms. No leaks – each booster car seat is backed by hiccapop for life.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very useful product and hassle free lifetime warranty
reviews.reviewText: Gone are the days of wrestling bulky booster seats! The hiccapop UberBoost has been a game-changer for our family's on-the-go lifestyle. Installation is a breeze – literally just inflate and buckle! This makes it perfect for taxis, carpools, or rental cars, eliminating the need for bulky traditional seats.But the convenience doesn't stop there. The UberBoost packs away compactly, fitting effortlessly into backpacks or luggage. This makes it fantastic for travel, saving precious cargo space and eliminating rental fees. Plus, the inflatable design offers surprising comfort, keeping our child happy even on long journeys.Speaking of long journeys, life happens, and even the best inflatables are susceptible to punctures. Thankfully, hiccapop backs their product with a lifetime replacement warranty. I recently put this to the test when our UberBoost sprung a leak. The customer support team was incredibly helpful, guiding me through the simple warranty process and promptly sending a replacement.Overall, the hiccapop UberBoost is a lifesaver for families who value convenience, portability, and peace of mind. Its ease of use, travel-friendly design, and exceptional warranty make it a top choice for parents seeking a reliable and hassle-free booster seat solution. If you're looking for a car seat that can keep up with your active lifestyle, I highly recommend giving the UberBoost a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy for traveling
reviews.reviewText: Took two of these with me to travel in cabs on vacation with my twins. Due to the amount of bulk with 2 of them inflated, I had to deflate and re-inflate them often through the trip and each time it was very easily done. Deflating and folding it up to put in the pouch took maybe a minute each. Inflating is easy, under a minute each. Deflated, both fit inside one pouch which helps when you’re traveling. I brought a carabiner to clip them together for occasions when I didn’t deflate them and just carried them slung on my arm, but I don’t recommend this method of carrying for long term. I clipped the carabiner on the loops meant for securing the shoulder clip and the cloth is starting to wear and stretch out too much from the weight of the booster. It’s not meant for this purpose so I can understand why it’s wearing down.Anyway, in terms of safety, I think the product works fine. Hooking and unhooking the seat belt through the metal clips takes an extra few seconds but not a big deal. Cabbies were never impatient with us when we took care of this because they’re mostly just grateful we brought our own boosters for the kids. My kids are on the small side, but they’re 40 lbs and the booster gave them enough height to safely ride with a seat belt on in the cab. I felt good about them sitting on them and my kids said they were very comfortable, even on an hour long ride. In even tiny Uber cars, I could fit one on the left and one on the right and I’d sit in the middle between them while dad sat in the passenger seat in the front. It made vacation travel super easy. I’d recommend it for travel purposes, especially for people with multiple kids. Sure beats lugging a car seat or a traditional booster.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy and portable
reviews.reviewText: We now has 3 of these (gave them to grandparents as well as our car). My 9 year old is on the smaller size and just doesn't fit a full seat belt the way she should yet but is super embarrassed to sit in a "baby" seat (regular car seat booster). This is a great compromise. Small and easy enough to move around and switch cars, but sturdy enough to give her that little lift to get the belt to fit her right. We have been using our first one for about 3 years and it has lasted well (every few months you need to reflate a little is using it every day). No holes, tears and doesn't rapidly deflate like another brand we tried. Love that it fills with three little puffs of breath. It has little plastic hooks on either side to help it tether to the belt so it doesn't slide and both my kids say it is comfy to sit on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for travel, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Quick and easy to inflate with a few breaths. Easy to install. Cover can be cleaned easily. Folds down nicely to fit in a backpack or carryon. Lightweight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Ubers while traveling
reviews.reviewText: This worked perfect for a vacation with my kid who still needs a booster seat. It only takes a few breaths to inflate and is really easy to deflate. The valve is large with a flap that closes between breathes but allows you to open it with a finger to deflate quickly. When deflated it rolls up small enough to put in a backpack (I was using a “fashion” type one, not a bookbag). Light weight and easy. Highly recommend for traveling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and lightweight
reviews.reviewText: Hiccapop sent us a replacement bladder just in time for our trip after our first one sprung a small leak. Great company, great product and great travel experience.Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars choose this over Bubble Bum
reviews.reviewText: We have a few booster seats between my, spouse's, and in-laws' vehicles: Nuna, Diono, Bubble Bum, and now this one. I purchased this to keep in my car as a backup for those moments when I have an extra kiddo in the car and/or for travel. I previously purchased a Bubble Bum, which my child did not like in terms of comfort or security. She likes this booster seat, she requested we swap out her Diono Solana for this. Pros: comfortable (has a deeper and wider seat), is a bit taller than Bubble Bum so the child sits up more, easy to inflate and deflate, easy to install, the grippy bottom means it actually stays put on the seat, the metal belt feeds are secure and hold the seat belt in place, and the shoulder seat belt adjuster actually works! I don't have to unclip the shoulder seat belt adjuster when unbuckling the kiddo from the car. Cons: limited colors, I guess? It's a bit wider than the Bubble Bum, but not prohibitive for getting three kids (one in a rear-facing Nuna Rava, the other in a Diono Solana) across the back of a sedan.Overall, highly recommended as a booster seat. Child and parent approved. And by the NTSB.
Nos gusto mucho, son de buena calidad, muy fáciles de inflar y colocar, ademas de que sin inflar son muy portables y nada moletos. Funcionaron perfecto para el viaje. Sin duda muy buena opción.

Cumplió con la expectativa. La usamos para viaje a USA, tiene unos ganchitos laterales donde se mete el cinturón de seguridad y es facilísimo de inflar. Trae su muy bonita funda y otros adaptadores . Mi hijo de 4 le quedó muy bien.

Alguna ocasión una familia nos recomendó usar estos boosters y decidimos comprar este. Recién lo usamos en un viaje en que rentamos auto y es muy bueno, quedó perfecto para una niña de 7 años que pesa 22 Kg.Tiene una banda que ayuda a ajustar el soporte de pecho para que le quede bien al niño. Excelente.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente booster, comodo, compacto, ligero y con buen ajuste.
reviews.reviewText: Me ha funcionado muy bien este booster para mi hijo de 1.1 mt y al rededor de 20 kilos de peso.Antes había comprado un asiento rígido, pero además de incomodo, no ajustaba bien el cinturón a su cadera.Este asiento si coloca correctamente al niño y el cinturón.Tengo más de dos meses con él, y se ha quedado en el carro bajo rayo intenso de sol y con temperaturas mas que elevadas, y no ha perdido el aire.Viene con un kit para reparar pinchaduras, y con una cinta para ajustar la correa de hombro del cinturón para que no quede lastimando el cuello del niño.Es ideal para un viaje, ya que en el avión puedes desinflarlo para llevarlo en el equipaje, y al rentar un auto no tienes que pagar adicional por un asiento de niño.

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena opción para viaje de booster
reviews.reviewText: Muy práctico, fácil de inflar y desinflar, mi hija de 5 años lo usó y fue cómodo.
